mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MANAGELIST WHERE STATUS = 'Y' and mNo = #{mno}

SELECT P.bNo, M.ID, P.STATUS, P.PLANTNAME, P.PETNAME, P.LOCATION, P.CONTENT, P.ORIGINAL_IMG, P.RENAMED_IMG, P.START_DATE, P.WATER_DATE, M.NAME, P.CREATE_DATE, R.pNo as R_pNo, R.bNo as R_bNo, R.POPTION as R_POPTION, R.CONTENT as R_CONTENT, R.STATUS as R_STATUS, R.WATER_DATE as R_WATER_DATE, R.CREATE_DATE as R_CREATE_DATE, M2.ID as R_ID FROM MANAGELIST P JOIN MEMBER M ON(P.mNO = M.mNO) LEFT OUTER JOIN PLANTREPLY R ON(R.bNo = P.bNo) LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER M2 ON(R.mNO = M2.mNO) WHERE P.STATUS = 'Y' AND P.bNo= #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MANAGELIST( bNo, mNo, STATUS, PLANTNAME, PETNAME, LOCATION, CONTENT, ORIGINAL_IMG, RENAMED_IMG, START_DATE, WATER_DATE, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES ( 0, #{mno}, DEFAULT, #{plantname}, #{petname}, #{location}, #{content}, #{originalimg}, #{renamedimg}, #{startdate}, #{waterdate}, DEFAULT );
